properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11 v12 v13 v5 v6 v7 v8 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Our lives are full of worthless things

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We fill them up with
the treasures life around us bring

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Why do we try so hard, miserable and tired?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Within the end our struggles all in vain

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Not for selfish gain I follow You, Lord, Jesus

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: You endured the pain and gave Your life to free us

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: So to life is gone I would carry onâ€¦

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Teach me, Oh, Lord to follow You

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: And let me live like the way that You would want me to

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: Give me strength and courage to stay true
